main event: A glowing white object the size of a dime was observed stationary and motionless for 15 minutes in Belton, Missouri.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes, which is considered a relatively long duration for a UFO sighting.
The report describes the object as 'glowing white' and the 'size of a dime', providing some physical details about its appearance.
The report indicates that the case was considered 'reliable and possibly excessive', suggesting the witness was credible.
The report concludes that there was 'insufficient data' to draw a definitive conclusion about the sighting.
The sighting occurred at 6:00 PM (1800 hours) on November 9, 1957.
sighted object: a glowing white object the size of a dime
